name: v1.2.0
v1.1.1
body:
`router-gradle-plugin`: 0.8.2  
`router`: 1.1.1

重构接口`RouteInterceptor`中的方法参数，提供所有的options，方便使用。

Sorry for this breaking change.

name: v1.1.0
body:
`router-gradle-plugin`: 0.8.0  
`router`:1.1.0  
`router-compiler`:0.6.0  

EN:  
1. Compat for plugin 'android-apt'. (This plugin is deprecated.)
2. Support fragment.

CN:  
1. 兼容‘android-apt’插件.(该插件已弃用)
2. 支持注解fragment，用法见wiki和demo.

name: v1.0.4
body: rm support for Size/SizeF.

name: v1.0.3
body: Bug fix for methods `with(...)`

name: v1.0.2
body:
EN:  
1. Deprecated method [IRouter#extras](https://github.com/chenenyu/Router/blob/master/router/src/main/java/com/chenenyu/router/IRouter.java).
2. Add methods [with(Bundle)、with(PersistableBundle)、with(String key, Object value)](https://github.com/chenenyu/Router/blob/master/router/src/main/java/com/chenenyu/router/IRouter.java).
3. Overload api `go(context)`, now you can call `go(fragment)` to startActivityForResult in your fragment.

CN:  
1. 弃用[IRouter#extras](https://github.com/chenenyu/Router/blob/master/router/src/main/java/com/chenenyu/router/IRouter.java)。
2. 添加三个重载方法[with(...)](https://github.com/chenenyu/Router/blob/master/router/src/main/java/com/chenenyu/router/IRouter.java)来操作bundle。
3. 重载`go(...)`，现在可已调用`go(fragment)`来跳转并在fragment接收result。

name: v1.0.1
body:
`router-gradle-plugin`: v0.7.0

默认引用最新的`router`和`compiler`，取消对jack编译链的支持(google已放弃jack)。

`router`: v1.0.1

修复某些情况下callback不会调用的问题。

name: v1.0.0
body:
`gradle-plugin`: 0.5.0
`router`: 1.0.0

1. Supports ipc.
2. [Fixed  #15]Empty route table when there is no route annotation in lib module.
3. Supports `ActivityOptions`.

name: v0.9.1
body:
1. Bug fix for `0.9.0` #12 .
2. Add base abstract matcher for both implicit intent and explicit intent.

name: v0.9.0
body:
`router-gradle-plugin: 0.5.0`  
`router:0.9.0`  
`compiler:0.5.0`  
`annotation:0.2.0`  

Important changes:  
1. 添加新注解[`Interceptor`](https://github.com/chenenyu/Router/blob/master/annotation/src/main/java/com/chenenyu/router/annotation/Interceptor.java), 升级注解[`Route`](https://github.com/chenenyu/Router/blob/master/annotation/src/main/java/com/chenenyu/router/annotation/Route.java)。
2. 除了支持全局拦截器外，现在支持为`Activity`指定特定的拦截器，详情参见[wiki](https://github.com/chenenyu/Router/wiki/%E6%B7%BB%E5%8A%A0%E6%8B%A6%E6%88%AA%E5%99%A8).

Normal changes:  
1. 重构了`Matcher`包，添加抽象类[`AbsMatcher`](https://github.com/chenenyu/Router/blob/master/router/src/main/java/com/chenenyu/router/matcher/AbsMatcher.java)，自定义`Matcher`时继承此类即可。

Breaking changes:  
1. 重构了[`RouteCallback`](https://github.com/chenenyu/Router/blob/master/router/src/main/java/com/chenenyu/router/RouteCallback.java)。

name: v0.8.0
body:
`router-gradle-plugin`: 0.4.0
`router`: 0.8.0
`router-compiler`: 0.4.0

CN:
1. 优化接入流程，改善初始化异常提醒。
2. 不仅支持javac编译链，新增对JackAndJill编译链的支持！  

EN:
1. Optimizes integration procedure, and improves exception log.
2. Supports both javac toolchain and jackandjill toolchain!

name: v0.7.0
body:
`router` v0.7.0
1. Fix `RouteOptions` `reset()` bug.
2. Add friendly notice when initializing failed.

name: v0.6.0
body:
gradle-plugin: 0.3.0
router: v0.6.0
compiler: v0.3.0

1.支持配置多个productFlavor并且applicationId不一致的情况
2.添加绿色通道`skipInterceptors()`，即跳过所有拦截器

name: v0.5.0
body:
1. `router-gradle-plugin` v0.2.0.  Provide support for specifying the version of `router` and `compiler`.
2. `router` v0.5.0. Update matcher.

name: New integration system
body:
1. `router-gradle-plugin` v0.1.0  
2. `router` v0.4.0  
3. `compiler` v0.2.0
4. `annotation` v0.1.0

Supports cross-module route now!

body:

3. Support url matcher.
4. Other improvements.

body: First release! 🚀 🚀 🚀
